Luna bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ọwụwa anyanwụ Democratic Republic of the Congo

Guthrie kenyere ya otu a na-akpọ Songe (L.20), ọ ga-abụ otu n'ime asụsụ Luban nke Ahmed guzobere (1995), dị ka ọtụtụ n'ime ọtụtụ asụsụ Songe ndị ọzọ, ọ bụ ezie na ekwughị ya kpọmkwem.  Ruhlen (1987) kwenyesiri ike na itinye ya na asụsụ Luban.
